cerave-salicylic-cleanser.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe SA cleanser provides gentle, non-irritating exfoliation without harsh microbeads or grains that can scratch or injure the skin. Suitable for the face and body as well as acne-prone and psoriasis-prone skin. This salicylic acid cleanser contains three essential ceramides, hyaluronic acid and niacinamide, to help restore the skin barrier, retain hydration and help soothe the skin. This formula is also non-comedogenic, fragrance-free and enriched with vitamin D for extra antioxidant protection.

var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } Kareen Morrison5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight Reviewed in Canada on June 13, 2025Scent: 100mlVerified Purchase I recently tried the d'alba Piedmont Italian White Truffle First Spray, and it has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine! This product is a game-changer for anyone seeking a touch of luxury combined with effective skincare.**Scent:** The fragrance is divine! The rich, earthy aroma of white truffle is both unique and sophisticated. It adds a delightful sensory experience to my daily routine without being overwhelming. A few spritzes leave a subtle yet luxurious scent that lingers throughout the day.**Texture and Application:** The spray has a lightweight, almost watery texture that absorbs quickly into the skin. It feels refreshing and hydrating, making it perfect for morning and evening use. I love using it after cleansing my face; it provides a great base for my moisturizer.**Hydration and Benefits:** After using this spray consistently, I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture and overall hydration. It gives my skin a healthy glow and helps to prep it for makeup application. Plus, the nourishing ingredients make me feel like I'm treating my skin to something special.**Packaging:** The packaging is elegant and practical. The spray nozzle delivers a fine mist, ensuring even coverage without wasting product. It looks beautiful on my vanity, adding a touch of sophistication.Overall, the d'alba Piedmont Italian White Truffle First Spray is an indulgent addition to any skincare routine. If you’re looking for a product that not only smells amazing but also delivers on hydration and skin benefits, I highly recommend giving this a try Read more 31 people found this helpful Helpful Report

var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } lauren stelte3.0 out of 5 stars A good product, but set your expectations Reviewed in Canada on June 4, 2025Scent: 100mlVerified Purchase I was influenced to buy this from all the social media reviews showing their skin looking super glowy and perfect but I quickly realized that my skin wasn’t going to look like that without the right cameras and ring lights and filters. I think I expected to have that look all day but that’s my fault for being unrealistic 😝. I find the scent to be very pleasant and light and I haven’t broken out which is a good sign because I have very sensitive skin. All in all it’s good, but don’t expect to look like the insta models 🥴 Read more 81 people found this helpful Helpful Report

var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } mrs_strombo5.0 out of 5 stars Little gold patches of magic! Reviewed in Canada on August 5, 2025Pattern Name: Gold (24 Pairs)Verified Purchase I am so impressed with these gold eye masks! From the moment I put them on, they feel incredibly soothing and refreshing. I’ve been using them in the mornings when my eyes look puffy or tired, and within 15 minutes, I can see and feel the difference.The skin under my eyes feels noticeably plumper and deeply moisturized, like I’ve just had a professional treatment. They give my under-eye area a smooth, hydrated look, and help reduce that dull, tired appearance.The masks stay in place really well (no slipping!) and there’s a generous amount of serum. var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } Sandra 4.0 out of 5 stars At-Home Spa Day Vibes! 🌿✨ Reviewed in Canada on January 31, 2025Pattern Name: Gold (6 Pairs)Verified Purchase Grace & Stella Eye Masks – At-Home Spa Day Vibes!I grabbed the 6-pack of these Grace & Stella eye masks for a little at-home spa day treat, and I was excited to see if they’d help with my dark circles. I’ve used them a few times now, and while I can’t say I’ve seen drastic improvements (yet—I'm only a few uses in!), I wanted to share my experience so far!First off, no irritation for me, and I have super sensitive skin. That’s a big win! I store them in the fridge, which adds an extra cooling kick. There’s something so satisfying about those chilled, relaxing vibes. It feels like a mini escape without leaving my couch. And hey, I’m all about that self-care life, right?As for dark circles, I’m still waiting to see if they’ll work their magic long-term, but honestly, after just a few uses, I haven’t noticed a major change. Maybe with more frequent use, I'll get more noticeable results? I can’t speak to puffiness since that’s not really an issue for me, but I’m betting the fridge trick would definitely help with that!Final thoughts: If you’re looking for a relaxing, refreshing treat for your face that doesn’t irritate sensitive skin, these are totally worth trying! Will they cure dark circles right away? Probably not. But for a chilled-out, pampering experience, I’m sold. Your Under Eye Skincare Routine for Dark Circles - Eyes are the first thing people notice. Feel confident and look your best, refreshed, awake, youthful, and brightened by adding these blue under eyes patches into your daily self-care routine.

No More Tired Eyes or Inflammation - Reduce puffiness, bags and swelling with these cooling under eye hydrating mask, and enjoy "me-time" while reducing the visibility of fine lines, smoothing undereye wrinkles, and dry under eye skin. Achieve hydrated and tightened under eye skin with these eye masks for dark circles and puffiness.

Unique Formula - Unlike other under eye patches for puffy eyes, these are Clean, Vegan, Paraben and Sulfate-Free ingredients that are gentle on sensitive skin. Infused with Niacinamide and Glycerin. Eye patches for puffy eyes are simple to use and provide eye depuffing instant results to under eye dark circles.

Loved by Millions - Featured in Fab Fit Fun, Ipsy, & Boxy Charm. Used by Jessica Alba, Leona Lewis, Ayra Starr and Emma Hernan from Selling Sunsets. The perfect dark circles under eye mask for women who enjoy self care gifts, vegan and clean beauty.

var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } KM5.0 out of 5 stars My favourite makeup removing wipe so far Reviewed in Canada on May 7, 2025Style: Fragrance FreeSize: 25 count (Pack of 2)Verified Purchase I bought several different types of make up removing wipes, and these have been my favourite out of all the major brand name options.I’m happy with the size, shape, thickness, and texture of the cloth, the package reseals nicely, and the solution seems to be very effective at removing makeup (including waterproof mascara and very stubborn mineral sunscreen, which my other products often struggle with!).One thing I particularly liked about this brand compared to the others was the level of moistness, even down to the last wipe in a slow-used pack! Some other brands didn’t seem moist enough to not be unavoidably abrasive on the skin, and while I don’t have the most sensitive skin, I do show red quite easily, so these wipes were far preferable on that front. Good price, too!As with all the wipes I have tried, I wouldn’t say that these wipes are sufficient to be used without also subsequently washing your face with actual water and a cleanser, but if you can’t get around to that this brand doesn’t feel quite as uncomfortable as the others did when not followed with a water wash. neutrogena-makeup-remover.description: Superior cleansing with Neutrogena's plant-based facial towelettes. These alcohol-free wipes effectively remove waterproof mascara, makeup, dirt and oil in one simple step. The dermatologist-tested formula is gentle enough for the sensitive eye area and contact lens wearers, leaving your face feeling refreshed with no residue. This special value twin pack includes 50 compostable wipes, making daily cleansing both convenient and environmentally conscious.
